name: Murcanto's Lair
description:
Pain / Reign Chaos / Mind's Eye / Emulsion Blood Spoiled / Bound Rat / Smear / Within Devoured Without / Regret Harvest / Pools Love Unrequited / Torment / Thought Jars Screaming / Death / Confined Dark Womb / Despair Imbued / Offerings Mournful / Scales Crawling / Warped Life Fabric / Skin Swollen / Disgust Bones / Broken Fester / Mouth Sewn / Nausea / Reflections Torn Memories / Chunk Quiver / Falling Demon / Vomit / Gorged Blood / Twitch Gurgle / Face Rotting / Dreams Fungal / Fever Brain / Barriers Melting / Rite Forgotten Sentinels / Slithering / Thought Freedom / Lost / Ashes Vermilion Scattered / Entrails / Watching Yearning / Incinerate / Lamentations Damned / Clutched Waiting / Clock Prison / Listless / Void Harnessing / Piles / Wails Dispossessed / Dreams Unrelenting / Thousand Eyes / Pact Pus Declension / Limb Flopping / Harmed Souls / Scurry Removed / Burned / Wounds Filled / Light Distorted / Disturbed / Fears Elemental / Moist / Above Approaches / Jars Liquid / Cerebral / Nightmare Walking / Breathing Shallow / Faces Maggots / Ivory / Slurping Skull / Expulsion Scatter / Remains Intellect / Fetal Consequential / Congeal Wretched / Spiked Corpses Drain / Tied / Liquid Down Secrete / Ones Collide Dreaming / Chains / Stench / Pane Beneath Hidden / Sliced / Flesh Lifeless Putrid / Ripped Prophetic / Husk Ruined / Dying Out / Carved / Vexing Judged / Meat Cursed / Fated / Dripping / Hands Holding / Silence  

Murcanto's Lair is one modular level of a "mega-dungeon" (a very large underground structure with many levels).  It has content that some may find disturbing.  It is a systemless dark fantasy adventure but the module will most likely be the easiest to run with an OSR (Old School Renaissance) retro-clone of your choice or one of the various editions of the most popular RPG in the land.
